snippet: The Chipotle chain’s first national ad focuses on sustainable farming, a method used for its product supply.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson Advertising column; Chipotle Mexican Grill creates animated film to promote sustainable farming in its first national commercial; proceeds from downloads of the spot via iTunes go to the Chipotle Cultivate Foundation, which encourages sustainable farming methods and family farming; a major selling point for the fast-food chain has been its commitment to fresh and sustainably grown ingredients.
lead_paragraph: The Chipotle chain’s first national ad focuses on sustainable farming, a method used for its product supply.

headline.main: An Animated Ad With a Plot Line and a Moral
headline.print_headline: An Animated Ad With a Plot Line and a Moral
